comments.body:
Sorry can you explain how does the name end up being extensions-v1beta1-definitions.html?
Whats the name for the other v1 file?
@nikhiljindal  I make the regex to match [^/]+ because we need to replace v1.1.0 with v1.1.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +69,73 @@// http://kubernetes.io/v1.1/xxx.html
func fixLinks(fileName, version string) error {
	mdRE := regexp.MustCompile(`http://releases.k8s.io/[^/]+(.*?\.)md`)
	repl := []byte("http://kubernetes.io/" + version + "${1}" + "html")
	file, err := ioutil.ReadFile(fileName)

comments.body: @nikhiljindal I make the regex to match [^/]+ because we need to replace v1.1.0 with v1.1.

Also, per offline-discussion, this only fixes the links in definitions/operations.html. But it's fine, because we don't have absolute links to .md file in other .md docs, they are all relative, and they will be taken care by other code.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +69,73 @@// http://kubernetes.io/v1.1/xxx.html
func fixLinks(fileName, version string) error {
	mdRE := regexp.MustCompile(`http://releases.k8s.io/[^/]+(.*?\.)md`)
	repl := []byte("http://kubernetes.io/" + version + "${1}" + "html")
	file, err := ioutil.ReadFile(fileName)

comments.body: Medium-term this should all come from style, yes?

Yes. The color is defined in the style of hmtl files in the master branch. We need some of the style to keep the table format. I think we should look for a way to overwrite these using _layouts/ and _scss/.
